html.h2: Importing the Management Pack into SCOM
html.p: Importing the Splunk Management Pack into SCOM is a one-time activity. To import the Splunk Management Pack into SCOM, follow these instructions:

ul.li: Start the SCOM Operations Console as an Administrator
Click on the Administration tab in the left hand side-bar
Select Management Packs from the Administration item tree
Select Import Management Packs from the Tasks Action pane.
In the Import Management Packs dialog that appears, select the Add button, then Add from Disk menu item.
When prompted to search online for dependencies, select No.
In the Select Management Pacs to Import dialog, navigate to the Splunk.Search.mpb file. This file is installed at C:\Program Files (x86)\Splunk
Select the Splunk.Search.mpb management pack file and click Open.
Click the Install button in the Import Management Packs dialog to complete the import process.

html.p: Once you have completed the import process, click on Next below.
